"Level Cap Trial II":
"This is a trial to apply for removal of the
level cap stipulated by ARKS regulations.
If you succeed in this mission, your abilities
will be recognized, and you will be able to
raise your level further. Have confidence
and don't be scared to challenge yourself.
※Items drop from Lv.21+ Natives,
Dragonkin and Mechs.
※All classes' level cap increases to 95
※Does not apply to Successor classes."

"Level Cap License II~VI
Advanced License for all regular classes"
